|- wb(wcel(c0, csgrp2), wa(wcel(c0, cmgm2), wbr(c1, casslaw, c2)))

-| diffsc(hs0, c0)

-| diffsw(hs0, wbr(c1, casslaw, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SGrpALT ↔(c0 ∈ MgmALT ∧ c1[assLaw]c2))
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((+ ` hs0)[assLaw](Base ` hs0)↔ c1[assLaw]c2))
⊣ SGrpALT = { hs0 ∈ MgmALT |(+ ` hs0)[assLaw](Base ` hs0)}
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, MgmALT)
⊣ d(hs0, c1[assLaw]c2)
